main event: A young boy (age 13) reported seeing a white, glowing object with a red center that disappeared rapidly into the night sky over Shreveport, Louisiana on May 31, 1957.
interesting points: The object hovered over Ridgewood Jr. High School before disappearing.
The object appeared to go into a light brighter than sunlight before vanishing.
The witness estimated the object's speed to be between 15,000 to 20,000 mph.
The witness estimated the object was about 200 yards away from him when he observed it.
The witness drew a sketch showing the object consisted of a larger white/red object with a smaller white object underneath, both moving along a path.
sighted object: A white, glowing object with a red center
